LanguageData.MisterHandy.label: Mister Handy
LanguageData.MisterHandy.description: Mister Handy is a very bright representative of the serial model of spherical robots, carefully produced and mass-produced throughout the territory of pre-war Equestria. The roles of a butler, a doorman, a personal bodyguard, or even a doctor are far from all that Mister Handy could do in the most wonderful way.
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.0.label: left bladed fist
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.1.label: right bladed fist
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.2.label: head
